Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory162.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGanRanGreen.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Thank you... thank you for defeating me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'If one of my forms is defeated, the true form will be greatly weakened.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'It finally... all... ends...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGanRanGreen.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "So our victory was of help to Brother's squad...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "After a pause, Huaxu's expression softens, as if readying to say goodbye."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGanRanGreen.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Chrome... my true form, the one with the similar structure to Gestalt, is in the hands of the real Kowloong.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Go with the flow of the river.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGanRanGreen.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The space trembles, and the walls crumble. The group can no longer tell up from down, until they spot a few familiar forms in the distance.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Chrome stops in his tracks and turns to watch Huaxu's form fade away.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGanRanGreen.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGanRanGreen.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory171.png'}
{3: 'As the morning sun rises, the Gray Raven squad is already waiting on the deck. The ship, no longer controlled by its original system, is quaking and swinging back and forth.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Phew... Now my job is done. I gotta draft up a mission report now, so I guess we'll talk later.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Aren't you going to say hi to Lee?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'It can wait until you all return to Babylonia. Right now, sorting out the info we just got is top priority. See you, then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Murray didn't tell you, but he saved me at a difficult juncture when I was being compelled. I would have been stuck in the dream if not for him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Why... why weren't the rest of you stuck in the dream?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Because you're Babylonian Constructs? Made with better tech...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "That's not it, Chaofeng. Babylonia doesn't have that kind of technology.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "The dream wasn't good enough. That's all.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Chrome pats Chaofeng on the shoulder and heads in the direction of the Gray Raven Commandant to greet them.'}
{3: 'Kamui rushes over, but quickly retreats.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Here, take this badge. It's for all members of Strike Hawk.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'For me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "If you feel like leaving the Kowloong Crew in the future, join us! You'd be a great fit.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'After finishing his speech, Kamui runs off to where Chrome is and starts being rowdy with the Gray Raven.'}
{3: 'Gripping the Strike Hawk medal tight, Chaofeng gazes at the silhouettes before him, blinding like the shining sun.'}
{3: 'Under his mask, he squints.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1101_5.jpg'}
{3: 'Kamui slaps Chrome hard on the back.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Gray Raven ended up saving us after all... Thanks.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's nothing. We're all working for the same goal, after all."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's all over now. This ship can finally return to its rightful home."}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: '...Yes. The real home of the KCC, the real Kowloong, should be somewhere close to where this ship will finally dock.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The "real" Kowloong?'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'The ship we see here is simply a mirage dreamed up by fools, traveling down the same nonexistent route day and night, like an ouroboros chasing after its tail.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'With the false path now gone, the endless journey shall now end.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hey! Look!'}
{3: 'Above the bow of the ship, rays of sunshine pierce through the dark clouds, illuminating a strange, looming tower that splits the horizon into two.'}
